video_prompt: A chrome-plated feminine robot, initially contemplative, fluidly shifts its elegant pose on a vibrant red surface. Its articulated metallic limbs move with precise grace. Dynamic reflections shimmer across its polished surface, catching shifting light and distorted crimson hues. Shadows gracefully glide across the seamless red environment, indicating its changing form. The robot's head subtly turns, appearing to scan its surroundings, conveying an evolving sense of observation.
image_prompt: A highly detailed chrome feminine android, with a sleek anatomically female form. It features a smooth ovular helmet head with a metallic visor (no visible facial features) and intricate circular ear-like attachments. Its body has segmented metallic panels, finely articulated skeletal hands, and chrome high heels. The android is in a languid, contemplative seated pose, with its head slightly tilted. It is set against a seamless, minimalist vibrant red studio background. Emphasize dynamic reflections, bright white specular highlights, and crimson hues reflected on its polished surface, with subtle cast shadows, conveying futuristic elegance and a high-fashion aesthetic.
refined_video_prompt: Its elegant pose fluidly shifts. Articulated limbs move with precise grace. Dynamic reflections shimmer across its surface, catching shifting light and distorted crimson hues. Shadows gracefully glide across the environment, indicating its changing form. The head subtly turns, appearing to scan its surroundings, conveying an evolving sense of observation.
